meanings.definition: In a visual or pictorial manner.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were explained graphically with pictures and diagrams.
meanings.sent2: She presented the data graphically using colorful charts.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to communicate graphically by drawing on the wall with its paw.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were displayed graphically on his face, showing his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of the landscape graphically in his painting.

meanings.sent1: The graphically designed website was visually appealing to users.
meanings.sent2: The book cover featured a graphically striking illustration.
meanings.sent3: The graphically decorated cake looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was graphically bold, with vibrant colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The graphically stunning sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Represented or displayed in a visual form.
meanings.sent1: The graphically represented data made it easier to understand the trends.
meanings.sent2: The logo was graphically simple yet memorable.
meanings.sent3: The graphically depicted characters in the comic book came to life.
meanings.sent4: The graphically illustrated map guided them through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The graphically enhanced video game transported players to a virtual world.
